body.p:
State of New York
City & County of New York ss:

I Sylvester Lay of said city to hereby solemnly swear that I will well and truly execute perform the & discharge the duties of the Office of Commissioner of the State of Kentucky according to the laws of the State of Kentucky to the best of my ability So help me God.
Subscribed and sworn to before me November 22, 1861

J. B. Nones
Commr. of Kentucky
for New York.
